name: mca-starter-kit
description: Mobile Chrome Apps Starter Kit is Yet Another Opinionated Boilerplate for Chrome Apps development

scripts.postinstall: cd src && npm install && npm install --save-dev cca-delegate gulp-util && bower install && gf-import ./bower_components/font-roboto/roboto.html --html=./bower_components/font-roboto/ && cd ./platform && cca prepare && cordova-config set name "$npm_package_name" && cordova-config set id $npm_package_appId && cordova-config set desc "$npm_package_description" && cordova-config set author "$npm_package_author_name" "$npm_package_author_email" "$npm_package_author_url"
